reviews.text:
Butter croissant and waffles are must.
You can take a seat in and enjoy the environment.
There's not much to gaze upon but food and ambience is calm & cool due to outsiders as moon dance cafe itself is a recommended chain.
They have some amazing food and coffee. The staff is really very kind and generous to guide you through. Great place to enjoy your coffee while waiting for the bus.

Good food. We ordered Israeli breakfast which was amazing. The view from here is also good. Nutella pan cake is the best out here.

Can improve upon the service though.
The place was really good. It's a great stop for out of town tourists. It has great options for baked food and crepes.
Good food at decent rates. The service was also faster than the other cafes in Kasol. The Israeli dishes were nice. The burger was a letdown though
